channel.title: Cold'sCraft 24/7 pvp-survival with factions,shop and much MORE
channel.description:
hey guys its XxCOLDSN1PERxX here to tell you about an amazing server called Cold'sCraft. this server is for premium Minecraft members only. here are some of the plugins we have: FoundBoxx, NoCheatPlus, Anti logger, WorldGuard, EssentialsProtect, ChestShop, Factions and much more. At this moment we have two admins(not including myself) which i have taken my time to chose. these admins do NOT abuse their power unlike some from others server. i have noticed that some admins abuse there power and that just ruins the fun for everyone.
Forums for this server will be up soon :D there you can apply for admin and donate for access to special blox and commands!
We also will have many events where you can win amazing prizes and have tons of fun :D
IP- 69.205.116.228:25566
Hope to see you on soon :)
-[Owner]XxCOLDSN1PERxX
